ComicInfo.Summary:
“IN SENSURROUND!”
Someone’s butchering movie execs, and Hit-Girl’s getting the blame. Her blood-soaked L.A. adventures have caught the attention of an old enemy—one who’s ready for a little trip out west to seek revenge.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-----------------------|-----------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Francesco Francavilla | 1 | | B | Black & White Cover B | Francesco Francavilla | Missing | | C | Cover C | Amanda Conner | Missing |
ComicInfo.Title: The Golden Rage of Hollywood Part Three: In Sensurround!
